content:
Our new daily podcast gives you context and clarity on the stories shaping your world

AS MITCH MCCONNELL, America’s Senate majority leader, pledges a vote on the Green New Deal, a sweeping set of policies around climate and much more, we examine just what the legislation does—and doesn’t—lay out. Following Cyril Ramaphosa’s State of the Nation address, we explore the challenges South Africa’s president faces as an election looms. And our language columnist declares war on misused metaphors. Runtime: 22 min

ex: n. 西里尔（男子名）
n. 【男名】男子名
网络 米奇；米契；米切
n. 执行时间，运行时间

wp.runtime environment: 运行环境;运行时环境;行环境;环境
wp.runtime error: 运行时出错;运行时错误;运行时间错误;运转时出错
wp.Common Runtime: 公共运行时;语言和通用运行时;公共运行环境;运行库
wp.Runtime Database: 运行时数据库;运行数据库;分布式动态数据库
wp.runtime host: 运行时主机;执行阶段主机;库宿主
wp.Reports Runtime: 不指定报表名而打开;报表运行器

ex: n. 参议院（美国、澳大利亚、加拿大、法国等国家的两个立法机构之一；美国许多州议会也设有参议院）
网络 上院；元老院；美国参议院
eg2: a member of the Senate
参议员
a Senate committee
参议院委员会
the senate of Loughborough University
拉夫伯勒大学评议会

ex: n. 专栏作家
网络 专栏记者；名家专栏；报刊专栏作家

wp.antitrust legislation: 反托拉斯法;反趿拉斯法;反垄断法;取缔垄断行径
wp.Subordinate Legislation: 次级立法;从属立法;附属立法
wp.environmental legislation: 环境立法;环境法规;环境法例

ex: n. 立法；法律
eg2: But policy and legislation can only go so far.
但政策和立法只能走这么远。
The new government dismantled their predecessors' .
新政府废除了前任政府的立法。
There should benothing controversial about this piece of .
这个立法法案不应该有任何的争议。

ex: v. 赫然耸现；（尤指）令人惊恐地隐现；显得突出；逼近
n. 织布机
网络 织机；若隐若现；迫近
eg2: A dark shape loomed up ahead of us.
一个黑糊糊的影子隐隐出现在我们的前面。
There was a crisis looming.
危机迫在眉睫。
The prospect of war loomed large.
战争的阴影在逼近，令人忧虑。
The prospect of war loomed large.
战争的阴影在逼近，令人忧虑。

wp.extended metaphor: 延伸隐喻;扩展的隐喻;拓展隐喻
wp.DEAD METAPHOR: 亡隐喻;死隐喻;原义已消失的比喻;死比喻
wp.computer metaphor: 计算机比喻;计算机隐喻

ex: n. 暗喻，隐喻；比喻说法
eg2: The metaphor extends to all of chemistry.
这个隐喻扩展到化学的所有领域。
In poetry the rose is often a  for love.
诗歌中常用玫瑰花来隐喻爱情。
Let us distinguish the various types of .
让我们把各种隐喻分类。

wp.drug misuse: 药物误用;药物使用不当;药物滥用;滥用药物种类

ex: vt. 滥用；误用；虐待
n. 滥用；误用；虐待
eg2: I noticed a  of the word “who” in your letter.
我发现在你的信中误用了who这个词。
One is the question of corruption, and the related misuse of authority.
挑战之一是腐败问题以及相关的对权威的滥用。
How we spend what we have. How we waste and misuse our emotional assets.
我们如何花费自己的财富，又是如何浪费和滥用我们的情感财富的。

ex: n. 保证；抵押；诺言；抵押品
v. 抵押；保证给予（或做）；正式承诺；使保证
网络 誓言；发誓；碧丽珠
eg2: a pledge of support
支援的许诺
Will the government honour its election pledge not to raise taxes?
政府会履行其竞选诺言，不增加税收吗？
Management has given a pledge that there will be no job losses this year.
资方保证今年不会削减工作职位。
Japan has pledged $100 million in humanitarian aid.
日本已承诺提供一亿元人道主义援助。
The government pledged their support for the plan.
政府保证支持这个计划。
We all had to pledge allegiance to the flag(= state that we are loyal to our country) .
我们都必须对国旗宣誓效忠。
The group has pledged to continue campaigning.
这个组织发誓继续投入运动。
The group has pledged that they will continue campaigning.
这个组织发誓他们将继续投入运动。
They were all pledged to secrecy.
他们都宣誓保密。
The government has pledged itself to root out corruption.
政府已承诺铲除腐败。
Do you think you'll pledge this semester?
这学期你会加入大学生联谊会吗？
My brother pledged Sigma Nu.
我哥哥宣誓加入 Σ NU 联谊会。

wp.longitudinal strain: 纵向应变;纵向变形;线应变;长轴应变
wp.volumetric strain: 体积应变;体应变;		容积应变
wp.breaking strain: 断裂应变;致断应变;破坏应变;裂断应变
wp.dynamic strain: 动应变;动态应变;动态应变放大器;动态张力
wp.creep strain: 蠕动应变;蠕变变形;蠕变应变;潜应变

ex: n. 张力；拉紧；负担；扭伤；血缘
vi. 拉紧；尽力
vt. 拉紧；滥用；滤去；竭力
n. (Strain)人名；(英)斯特兰
n. （植物、动物的）品种；种类
eg2: Whatever might have caused some muscle , it could be the source of your back pain.
不管怎样都有可能导致某些肌肉的紧张，它可能是背痛的原因。
If you go on living, you do so only through your capacity for objectification, your ability to free yourself, in writing, from the infinite .
如果你还要继续活下去，你只有通过自身客体化的能力，你能用写作从无限的拉力中解放你自己。
And so it began to pile up until one day I collapsed from the strain of it, becoming an empty shell, a parody of who I used to be.
所以它开始慢慢地堆积起来，知道有一天我在那些压力中崩溃了，变成一个空壳，变成过去的一拙劣的模仿品。

Title: The Green New Deal, South Africa’s report card and a war on strained metaphors

paperStatistics.title: The Green New Deal, South Africa’s report card and a war on strained metaphors
paperStatistics.desc: Our new daily podcast gives you context and clarity on the stories shaping your world
